# Assignment 2: Regression models, predicting from data {#assignment2}

### Assigment 3




```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
# Create a data frame of known distances and molecular weights
ladder <- data.frame(dist = c(34.5, 405.5, 612.5, 930.5, 1016.5, NA,NA,NA,NA,NA,NA,NA,NA), 
                     
                     mw = c(1000, 900, 800, 
                            700, 600, 500,
                            400, 300, 250, 
                            200, 150, 100, 50))
            

# Create a new data frame of unknowns
unknown <- data.frame(dist = c(18.5, 32.5, 608.5, 928.5, 1013.5))

# Fit the model
cal <- lm(log(mw) ~ dist, data = ladder)

d <- lm(mw ~ dist, ladder)

# Check model performance, R^2 should be ~ 1.
summary(cal)

preds <- exp(predict(cal, newdata = unknown))

predict(cal)


ladder %>% 
  ggplot(aes(dist, mw)) + 
           geom_point() +
  geom_abline(intercept = coef(d)[1], slope = coef(d)[2])
  
```
